document.full_text: the european central bank is likely to signal a july interest rate rise on thursday while continuing to provide banks with unlimited amounts of cash to help weaker lenders hit by the euro zone debt crisis.
document.title: ecb expected to signal july rate increase
lines_and_colors: the european central bank is likely to signal a july interest rate rise on thursday while continuing to provide banks with unlimited amounts of cash to help weaker lenders hit by the euro zone debt crisis.
